article_title: Dollar Slips on Profit-Taking Following U.S. Jobs Data
article_text:
The dollar fell against the yen and the euro on Friday following a solid employment report for July as investors booked profits on recent gains in the U.S. currency.

The dollar dropped 0.3% versus the common currency, as one euro bought $1.0957 in late-afternoon trade, on track for its highest close against the dollar this month. The dollar declined 0.4% against the yen to ¥124.23. The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which measures...

article_summary:
The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which measures...
The dollar dropped 0.3% versus the common currency, as one euro bought $1.0957 in late-afternoon trade, on track for its highest close against the dollar this month.
The dollar fell against the yen and the euro on Friday following a solid employment report for July as investors booked profits on recent gains in the U.S. currency.
The dollar declined 0.4% against the yen to ¥124.23.
